body_html: Thanks @peterjc123. I'm pleased your code at least got torch on so thank you. I've spoken to the developers who say that using Jupyter is the problem, and that I should rather use Spyder. However, to edit in Spyder means I need to install Anaconda - which is what I was trying to avoid for the first place.

body: Thanks @peterjc123. I'm pleased your code at least got torch on so thank you. I've spoken to the developers who say that using Jupyter is the problem, and that I should rather use Spyder. However, to edit in Spyder means I need to install Anaconda - which is what I was trying to avoid for the first place.
